Class LaunchPad

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      modules.LaunchPad
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class LaunchPad
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener

This is the main class and the main entry point of the Launch Pad application.

The main purpose of this class is to provide the user a main menu to navigate and manage the system. Upon startup, it is the main resposibility of this object to initialize the application environment, select a store/server from the store list in the event the site manages multiple stores, establish a connection to the database, and verify that the database connection is in deed valid.

Each menu item is internally idenified by a process id.

Author:
rterrell

initializedApp

protected void initializedApp()
                       throws LaunchPadException
Performs initialization in terms of the logger, setting up environment variables, creating security token, and intializing iBatis.

Throws:
LaunchPadException - When any phase of the intialization process errors.

getSiteServerName

protected java.lang.String getSiteServerName()
                                      throws LaunchPadException,
                                             AppInitException
Retreives the name of the server for the site.

The source of this information is required to exist as a static List variable in the AppUtil class. This listing can contain one to many entries which each entry is comprised of a store number and server name. When a single entry is found, that entry will be used by default. When multiple entries exist, a UI dialog is presented for the purpose of requiring the user to select a store/server.

Throws:
LaunchPadException - Any application errors that can be corrected by the user.
AppInitException - Any system related errors that are beyond the user's control and requires support team involvment.

valueChanged

public void valueChanged(javax.swing.event.ListSelectionEvent e)
An event handler for caputuring the current main menu item when the user navigates from one meun item to the next using the UP/DOWN arrow keys.

By no means does this event handler navigate the user to another window component. It only identifies the current node and persist the current selection to an instance variable. This process is performed on subsequent selections.

Specified by:
valueChanged in interface javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener
